name: VeteransHealth
0:
”Alexa, open veterans health”
”Alexa, tell veterans health I'd like to visit a doctor near 4 Yawkey Way, Boston, MA”
”Alexa, tell veterans health I need care near Boston, MA”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: veterans health
des:
Did you know the Department of Veterans Affairs offers same-day care for Urgent Primary and Mental Health care needs? But where should you go? How do I get there and how long will it take? The answers to all of these questions and more can be answered by the Veterans Health skill for Alexa. 

Use this skill to search hundreds of VA Health locations across the entire United States. Alexa will use your current address to find up to three open locations and provide you real-time driving and traffic information to get you to the best care, fast. 


For example, you can say:

"Alexa, tell veterans health I'd like to visit a doctor near 100 Legends Way, Boston, MA" 
"Alexa, tell veterans health I need care near Boston, MA" 
"Alexa, tell veterans health I need care near 4 Yawkey Way, Boston, MA"

And Alexa will tell you exactly where to go to get care, quickly. 

You can use your full address for the most accurate driving time information and locations, or even just your city and state. 



This skill utilizes the Veterans Administrations public API, available here: https://developer.va.gov/ 
This product is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or supported by the Department of Veterans Affairs.
More about Same-Day care by the VA: https://www.va.gov/opa/pressrel/pressrelease.cfm?id=3998
